description:

I didn't even have to ask him to grow out his pubes. He says it is too much work and the girls can just deal with it.
He loved jacking off for the camera, and showing off to you. I don't think he watched much porn. Well, at the beginning he is watching it, and the video runs a little long as I try to show him getting hard in "real time" for those that like to see dicks expand.
Once up he never wilts, and gets off to seeing himself on the video cameras.
Felipe is not shy about dudes, but is too worried about what his friends will think if he is doing oral or sex with them.
I will see if I can talk him into it, but he needs to cop an attitude about it first. My gut tells me he is confident enough to get there, but for now, we just get to enjoy his amazing solo!
title: Felipe - Solo
